item.val: The Dream Job in Okinawa, Japan
Every year we do recruit around 20 working holiday seasonal staffs from all over the world, if you have JAPAN WORKING HOLIDAY VISA, please check more details at below.

• - Divemaster program
  • - Marine House SEASIR - NAHA Marine staff
  • - Marine House SEASIR AKA island - Pension staff (cleaning, restaurants)
  • - Marine Club BERRY MANZA - Marine staff
  • - Marine Club BERRY KANUCHA - Marine staff
  • - MYPLACE guest house - exchange helper

Please download RECRUITMENT for 2017 to check the job description,
and send your RESUME to us (booking@seasir.com).
